task.description: Create web UI using Thymeleaf for interactive HTML-to-PDF generation testing. Provides form for HTML input with PDF options configuration. URL-to-PDF form will be added in Version 2 (Phase 8).

acceptance-criteria.criterion: Main page accessible at GET /ui or /
Form for HTML to PDF conversion with textarea
UI elements for common PDF options (landscape, margins, etc.)
Responsive design (works on desktop and mobile)

task.note: URL to PDF form moved to Version 2 (Phase 8, TASK-046)

implementation-notes.note: Thymeleaf template features: - Textarea for HTML input (with syntax highlighting if possible) - Checkboxes for boolean options (landscape, printBackground, etc.) - Input fields for margins, scale, etc. - Generate PDF button that calls REST API via JavaScript - Display area for errors and success messages
Use Bootstrap or similar CSS framework for styling
JavaScript to handle form submission and PDF download
Add sample HTML templates in dropdown

testing-requirements.requirement: Test HTML to PDF conversion via UI
Test various PDF options (landscape, margins, scale, etc.)
